banner.title: Elepepe's Sanctuary
banner.text: We help rats, guinea pigs, and other rodents – straight from the heart.

intro.title: Who are we?
intro.p1: Elepepe's Sanctuary was born out of a pure need of the heart. It creates a safe haven for small, often underappreciated creatures – rats and guinea pigs – who, just like other animals, deserve love, respect, and professional care.
intro.p2: It all started with Elepepe – a unique rat who awakened a deep affection in his guardian and became his inspiration.
intro.p3: We are building a community of sensitive people for whom every life matters. The goal is not only to care for animals but also to connect those who want to help with those who need this help.

mission.title: Support in difficult times. Real help.
mission.text: The foundation exists to support guardians overwhelmed by treatment costs. Sometimes love for an animal is not enough when financial barriers arise. That is why we reach out to those who need support the most. We create a safe space where stories can be shared and rescue can be sought together for these little hearts.
